fields.name: dob
fields.description: Participant's date of birth in ISO 8601 format

fields.name: exception
fields.description: Placeholder for value indicating special processing instructions

fields.name: participant_id
fields.description: Participant's state-specific identifier. Must not be social security number or any personal identifiable information.

fields.name: benefits_end_month
fields.description: The final month when a participant will receive benefits. Leave this field blank if the participant will continue receiving benefits until the next recertification period.

fields.name: recent_benefit_months
fields.description: List of up to the last 3 months that participant received benefits, formatted as yearmonths separated by spaces. Does not include current benefit month. Months need to be consecutive. Fewer than 3 months can be entered for newer participants.

fields.name: protect_location
fields.description: Set true to indicate location protection for vulnerable individuals. Null or empty values will be treated as true throughout the system.
